definition[0]: if a company, factory, large machine etc shuts down or is shut down, it stops operating, either permanently or for a short time
example[0]: Our local hardware shop has shut down.
example[1]: an accident which resulted in two of the plant’s nuclear reactors being shut down
example[2]: The way to shut the machine down is to type EXIT.
definition[1]: to prevent an opposing team or player from playing well or getting points
example[3]: We all knew that to win we’d have to shut down Bobby Mitchell.
